column5: If anybody is intrested in Catching Channel Cats or Suckers they are starting to hit hard in the Lower Grand River Dunnville ..get out and enjoy these Scrapy fish..
Sounds good. Where can I buy bait?

At the grocery store for the channel cats.Just get yourself some chicken livers.Fish it 12" off the bottom and just wait for dinner.At least that works here.Other good baits are cut bait,worms and shrimp.Good eatin! Joe
I think there is a bait shop in Dunnville...might be called fishmaster bait and tackle....
I heard it closed.

im thinking since he owns a bait shop he might be the one person that hears the most reports on the lower grand? would you guys rather have him keep is mouth shut and not give reports so we dont have a clue how the bite is? give the guy a break  <_<
Hey would that mean they are running into most lake ontario tribs???? I would love to get some channel cats on the line... I live close to the rouge in scarb, duffins creek, and frenchmans bay.....
That's fair but it still doesn't answer my question.

There is a good chance i am going to be there this weekend if it does not rain that much. It would be my first time fishing there so any pointers would be appriciated I`ve had luck catching big cats on chicken liver and shrimp in red river in winnipeg when i used to live there.
That might work out pretty well, Marko. Please post a report after your outing. (pics, we like pics.)

Roy i do carry some good cat baits ...best rig for me is a 2/0 Mustad hook or a 4/0 circle hook  with a 2 oz slip sinker 18 " to a 2 way swivle for a weight stoper with a big gob of Worms or Stink Bait ..sit back wait for the rod to load up fish on ..there is lots of good spots to fish for big cats on the Grand River and im allways open to helping out where to fish ..all ya have to do is PM me or stop in ..
There ya go. See? All we needed to do was ask the right people.

Cats can be caught in the Grand from All Year Round ..best time is from end of March till Mid July the summer time shot were caught trolling on Big O's fishing Walleye i have caught some of my biggest Cats Trolling the Lower River .but in the Spring time it's best to dead stick them with Big Dead Stinky Baits ..Worms ,Sucker Meat ,Big Shrimp , Cut Shad ,
are the channel cats here good to eat? i caught and ate tons of them down at lake okeechobee but i don't think i ever caught one up here.
Yes the cats are very good eating but i wouln't eat them over 5lbs ...they also taste awesome smoked ..
hey thanks fishmaster, i'll have to head out there sometime
Aren't they hard to light ?  Which end do you light?  Sorry...just in a smartdonkey mood this morning
You need good water proof rolling paper's lol
Thanks for the report fishmaster.....If I happen to fish the lower grand, i am stopping buy your store just for putting out the effort of some decent fishing reports.......
Thanks moemoe ..ill be doing lots of reports very soon usally April i leave the store and then its full blast fishing & charter's ...Cats Perch Salmon Walleye Trout reports coming soon ...

i love fishing for cats,where we fish them near ottawa they are always co-operating and man do they fight hard,i would like to fish the grand some day soon,and maybe i will look you guys up,thanks for the info....cheers
Did anyone catch Fishful Thinking this morning me and Charlie Wray fishing for Grand River Cats ..
I did fishmaster hopefully you can hook me up with some tips later today.Weather permiting.Its on again at 3:30  on men tv
Jermy i will only be in the store till 12 today going to get my Big boat ready today ..store will still be open till 4 today
